definitions.definition: Of, pertaining to, or containing spice.
(of flavors) Provoking a burning sensation due to the presence of chilis or similar hot spices
definitions.example: This curry is too spicy for me. I can't eat it.

definitions.definition: (of flavors or odors) Tangy, zesty, or pungent.
definitions.example: She breathed in the strong, spicy aroma.

definitions.definition: (of expression or behavior) Vigorous; colorful; stimulating.
definitions.example: He is known for his spicy political commentary.
I don't want my children to see the spicy images on this web site.
